sorcer.service

Class ExertionException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • sorcer.service.ExertionException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ExertionException
extends Exception
    The ExertionException represents an exception that is thrown if an exertion is performed by a service provider failing to process it correctly. A complementary related throwable and/or ill behaving exertion can be embedded into this exception.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
